name: Consider the Superstructure (A03)
description: (Animated GIF, 1073 x 720 px /// 100 day commemorative editions) Open world map glitch in Cyberpunk 2077, discovered and recorded in 2021. This piece is part of a massive virtual photography project capturing the glitches and oddities of Night City. Series cited in the LA Review of Books in March 2021 // Work by Sabato Visconti // www.sabatobox.com // @sabatobox on IG
